data.title: Hometown Hero Banners
data.meta_description: The Chamber is excited to announce the Hometown Hero Banner Program, a community-building initiative developed by PerkUp with committee representatives from local veteran organizations. Following a Pilot Program that began last year, another series of ban
data.meta_site_name: UPPER PERKIOMEN VALLEY CHAMBER OF COMMERCE
data.text:
Upper Perk Hometown Hero Banner Program

In 2017, the Chamber and PerkUp established the Hometown Hero Banner Program, a community-building initiative, collaborating with local veteran organizations, businesses and East Greenville, Pennsburg, Red Hill Boroughs and Upper Hanover Township. If you would like to recognize a family member, neighbor or friend that has served or have interest in providing sponsorship, please download the program guidelines, banner application and sponsorship form below.

Applications are now available for the 2025 Program.

We are offering the opportunity to install your Hometown Hero Banner for an additional year after it has been retired (two installation rotations) from the program. Download the reinstallation application below:

Individuals or businesses interested in supporting the program please click below.

Consider Donating

Mission

Honor and recognize Upper Perkiomen Valley servicemen and women who have served or given their lives to our country in the United States Armed Forces.

​​

Questions

For questions or more information on the Banner Program, please call the Chamber office at 215.679.3336 or email [email protected]

​
